DOC.brief_summary: This study compare three alternative intervention emergency department ( ED ) promote substance abuse assessment , referral , treatment entry : 1 ) 5 session strengths-based case management model ( SBCM ) ; 2 ) 2-session motivational enhancement therapy ( MET ) ; 3 ) one-time brief informational feedback ( BIF ) session . The primary outcome variable trial include follow-through receiving assessment referral , treatment engagement . Additional outcome include degree treatment completion , alcohol-related measure , health service utilization , health status change , psychosocial factor .
